articles.title: Middle school principal in Maine draws criticism after dressing as ICE agent for Halloween
articles.description:
“The district is aware of a situation this past weekend involving a school employee," the superintendent said. "This situation occurred off RSU #9 grounds."

The post Middle school principal in Maine draws criticism after dressing as ICE agent for Halloween appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Principal from RSU #9 dressed as an ICE agent for Halloween, sparking controversy.
Superintendent confirmed awareness of the incident occurring off school grounds over the weekend.
Local community members express concerns about the implications for students' safety and inclusivity.
